Articles.Content:
Hey folks, does anyone know a mod that fills the empty slot as shown in the pic below, or how i could alter a mod to fill it? Such as the k2 command pod.

- - - Updated - - -

Its "simple command pods" which is the missing node by the way.

Well as i see it it is not empty, it has the 3 crew member capsule in it.

If you want to put more in there, just download a part pack with your favourite command capsules and change the tech node in the configs of that part. (part.cfg file, tech required = Technode Name )

If you haven't solved it yet (or if anyone gets the same issue): I just stumbled onto the same bug. It was my CommunityTechTree which was not up to date. I installed the latest 2.1 version, and now it works well.
